channel.title: How can I Hide my cmd box when hosting the server?
channel.description: I always wanted to hide it because my sister and brother doesnt want to touch it because they might close it on purpose i just want to know A long time ago i made a rsps and i had the program to hide it but i need to it again so if you still have it or know it please contact me at this email fr33henry@yahoo.com

item.title: How can I Hide my cmd box when hosting the server?
item.dc:creator: @javacoder javacoder
item.description:
@javacoder wrote:

Its ok guys i found a program to hide it it works great its called WinHide
